about_us.title: About Us
about_us.description: We are a team of passionate developers striving to deliver the best possible experience for our users. We believe in the power of technology to enhance everyday life.

login.title: Welcome Back
login.subtitle: Log in to access your account.

forgot.title: Forgot Your Password?
forgot.subtitle: Enter the email linked to your account.
forgot.helper: We'll send you a verification code by email.

verify.title: Check Your Email
verify.subtitle: Enter the 6-digit code we sent you
verify.helper: Didn't receive it? Check your spam folder or request a new code

reset.title: Reset Your Password
reset.subtitle: Create a new password for your account.
reset.successBody: Your password has been reset successfully. You can now log in with your new password.
